name: Hellohikimori™
description:
Hellohikimori™ is an independent design studio created in 2004.
HKI TAKES CARE OF EVERY ASPECT OF GRAPHIC CREATION.
We most capitalize on brand's unique characteristics in order to create projects that will stand out. Our challenge is to deliver memorable and captivating productions. Constantly focused on innovation and creation at all levels, each member at HKI likes to tell stories in the most beautiful and original way possible.
